    • Field Detail

      • defaultName

        public static java.lang.String defaultName
        Stores the default name for weapons.

        Set to "weaponName".

      • defaultDamage

        public static int defaultDamage
        Stores the default damage for weapons.

        Set to 5.

      • defaultCritChance

        public static int defaultCritChance
        Stores the default critial hit for weapons.

        Set to 0 (0% chance).

      • defaultMissChance

        public static int defaultMissChance
        Stores the default name for weapons.

        Set to 10 (10% chance).

      • defaultDescription

        public static java.lang.String defaultDescription
        Stores the default description for weapons.

        Set to "A weapon".

      • defaultDurability

        public static int defaultDurability
        Stores the default durability(Number of uses) for weapons.

        Set to 100 (100 uses).

      • defaultUnbreakable

        public static boolean defaultUnbreakable
        Stores the default unbreakable value.

        Set to false.

      • ITEMTYPE

        private final java.lang.String ITEMTYPE
        Stores the item type for weapons. Cannot be changed.

        Set to "weapon".

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • name

        private java.lang.String name
        Stores the name of this weapon.

        Set to defaultName.

      • damage

        private int damage
        Stores the damage of this weapon.

        Set to defaultDamage.

      • critchance

        private int critchance
        Stores the cirital hit chance of this weapon.

        Set to defaultCritChance.

      • misschance

        private int misschance
        Stores the miss chance of this weapon.

        Set to defaultMissChance.

      • description

        private java.lang.String description
        Stores the description of this weapon.

        Set to defaultDescription.

      • durability

        private int durability
        Stores the durability(number of uses) of this weapon.

        Set to defaultDurability.

      • unbreakable

        private boolean unbreakable
        Stores whether or not the weapon can break.

        Set to defaultUnbreakable.

      • customVariables

        private java.util.ArrayList<CustomVariable> customVariables
        Stores the custom variables for this weapon.

        Set to an empty ArrayList of CustomVariables.

    • Method Detail

      • getCustomVariableFromName

        public java.lang.Object getCustomVariableFromName​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the value of the custom variable in customVariables with the name given.

        If name is null, or no variable with that name is found, return null.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the custom variable.
        Returns:
        The value of the customvariable with the name given. If no name given or one not found, return null.

      • setCustomVariableByName

        public void setCustomVariableByName​(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the value of the variable in customVariables with the name given.

        If no name given, then dont do anything.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the custom variable.
        value - The value that the custom variable will be set to.

      • getDamage

        public int getDamage​()
        Returns the damage.
        Returns:
        damage

      • setDamage

        public void setDamage​(int a)
        Sets the value of damage.

        If the new value is less than 0, then it is set to 0.

        Parameters:
        a - The new value.

      • getCritChance

        public int getCritChance​()
        Returns the critchance.
        Returns:
        critchance

      • setCritChance

        public void setCritChance​(int a)
        Sets the value of critchance.

        If the new value is greater than 100, then it is set to 100. If less than 0, then set to 0.

        Parameters:
        a - The new value.

      • getMissChance

        public int getMissChance​()
        Returns the misschance.
        Returns:
        misschance

      • setMissChance

        public void setMissChance​(int a)
        Sets the value of misschance.

        If the new value is greater than 100, then it is set to 100. If less than 0, then set to 0.

        Parameters:
        a - The new value.

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription​()
        Returns the description.
        Overrides:
        getDescription in class Item
        Returns:
        description

      • setDescription

        public void setDescription​(java.lang.String s)
        Sets the value of description.

        If the value is null, then set the description to the defaultDescription.

        Overrides:
        setDescription in class Item
        Parameters:
        s - The new value.

      • getDurability

        public int getDurability​()
        Returns the durability.
        Returns:
        durability

      • setDurability

        public void setDurability​(int a)
        Sets the value of durability.

        If the new value is less than 1, then the weapon breaks.

        Parameters:
        a - The new value.

      • increaseDurability

        public void increaseDurability​(int a)
        Increases the value of durability.

        If the weapon is unbreakable then nothing happens. If the new value is less than 1, then it breaks.

        Parameters:
        a - The new value.

      • decreaseDurability

        public void decreaseDurability​(int a)
        Decrease the value of durability.

        If the weapon is unbreakable then nothing happens. If the new value is less than 1, then it breaks.

        Parameters:
        a - The new value.

      • getUnbreakable

        public boolean getUnbreakable​()
        Returns unbreakable.
        Returns:
        unbreakable

      • getSimpleOutput

        public java.lang.String getSimpleOutput​()
        Returns the name, ITEMTYPE, and durability.
        Returns:
        name, ITEMTYPE, and durability

      • getOutput

        public java.lang.String getOutput​()
        Returns the name, description, ITEMTYPE, damage, critchance, misschance, durability and any customVariables with inOutput to true.
        Returns:
        name, description, ITEMTYPE, damage, critchance, misschance, durability and any customVariables with inOutput to true.

      • equip

        public void equip​()
        Sets the player's current weapon to this.

      • broken

        public void broken​()
        Removes this from the player's inventory
